message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
A good start, but I'm looking for more
I'll give you a better deal this time, but don't get too comfortable!
You're getting desperate, I'll give you a chance to reconsider!
You're really lowballing me, Bob. I'll give you a chance to make it up, but don't think you're getting away with this!
You're getting closer, but I'm not done negotiating yet!
You're really pushing me to the limit, Bob. I'll give you one more chance to make a serious offer, or I'll walk away!
You're really close to giving up, but I'm not done yet! I'll give you one more chance to make a deal!
You're really trying to lowball me now, Bob. I'll give you one last chance to make a decent offer, or I'll take everything!
You're really going all-in, Alice. I'll give you a tiny piece of the pie, but I'm taking the majority!
You've pushed me too far, Bob. I'm taking nothing and walking away. You win this time, but I'll be back!
